item.title: Prometheus HTTP Service Discovery of Cloud Run services
item.description: Some time ago, I wrote about using Prometheus Service Discovery w/ Consul for Cloud Run and also Scraping metrics exposed by Google Cloud Run services that require authentication. Both solutions remain viable but they didn’t address another use case for Prometheus and Cloud Run services that I have with a “thing” that I’ve been building. In this scenario, I want to: Configure Prometheus to scrape Cloud Run service metrics Discover Cloud Run services dynamically Authenticate to Cloud Run using Firebase Auth ID tokens These requirements and – one other – present several challenges:
